mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.dimension AS "dimension", a.value AS "value", a.original_value AS "originalValue", a.person_id AS "person.id", pe.nickname AS "person.nickname", a.item_id AS "item.id", it.name AS "item.name", a.measure_id AS "measure.id", me.name AS "measure.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN ope_person pe ON pe.id = a.person_id LEFT JOIN ope_item it ON it.id = a.item_id LEFT JOIN mod_measure me ON me.id = a.measure_id
mapper.update: INSERT INTO ope_human_marked_value( id, dimension, value, original_value, person_id, measure_id, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dimension}, #{value}, #{originalValue}, #{personId}, #{measureId}, #{personId}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE value=#{value},update_date=now()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ope_human_marked_value( id, dimension, value, original_value, person_id, item_id, measure_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dimension}, #{value}, #{originalValue}, #{person.id}, #{item.id}, #{measure.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ope_human_marked_value SET dimension = #{dimension}, value = #{value}, original_value = #{originalValue}, person_id = #{person.id}, item_id = #{item.id}, measure_id = #{measure.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
